front.title: IEEE Guide for Measurement of Pantograph Off-line and Evaluation of Current Collection Performance for High-Speed Railway
front.abstract: This guide provides comprehensive test methods for the pantograph off-line and the reasonable evaluation for the performance of current collection system in high-speed railway. Model for the arcing erosion, as well as the off-line induced transient overvoltage and harmonics, which impact the onsite devicesâ€™ safety are included.
